game.name: Exorush
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A 2D vertical shoot 'em up that lets you upgrade your ship with an insane amount of options. From missiles and pods to specials and shields, you can upgrade every bit of your ship from guns to thrusters.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 2D vertical shoot 'em up that lets you upgrade your ship with an insane amount of options. From missiles and pods to specials and shields, you can upgrade every bit of your ship from guns to thrusters.
